meanings.definition: Not worthy of attention or notice.
meanings.sent1: The plain, unremarkable book sat on the shelf unnoticed.
meanings.sent2: The unremarkable rock blended in with the others.
meanings.sent3: The unremarkable pencil tried to stand out by wearing a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: Her unremarkable outfit was like a whisper in a crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The unremarkable building faded into the background of the cityscape.

meanings.sent1: The unremarkable painting failed to capture anyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: His unremarkable speech was quickly forgotten by the audience.
meanings.sent3: The unremarkable cookie tried to be special by wearing a tiny bow.
meanings.sent4: The unremarkable melody was lost in the sea of music.
meanings.sent5: The unremarkable flower wilted among the vibrant blooms.
